get.summary: Get details about a file, including a pre-signed URL for download
get.description: Get information and details for the specified file ID, including metadata and a pre-signed URL for file download. The URL can be used as a curl command or directly with S3.

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the file to retrieve.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Optional parameter to see shared data in another tenant

parameters.name: presignedUrlMode
parameters.description:
Optional parameter to specify presigned url's content-disposition. If not specified, the browser will determine the default behavior.
            Possible values: Attachment, Inline, Browser

parameters.name: includeVolumeMetadata
parameters.description: Optional parameter to return volume's metadata

parameters.name: metadata.include
parameters.description: Optional parameter to specify comma separated patterns to include metadata by their field names.

parameters.name: metadata.exclude
parameters.description: Optional parameter to specify comma separated patterns to exclude metadata by their field names.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

delete.description: Permanently delete a file entry and its underlying content

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the file to delete.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

patch.summary: Update a file entry in GDS and get temporary credentials for upload
patch.description: Update a file entry in GDS. Returns temporary credentials and presigned url(s) for file upload directly to S3 when the include=objectStoreAccess parameter is used. Note that the currently supported changes to the file resource are updating the file type and the underlying content.

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the file to be updated.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
Optionally include additional fields in the response.
            Possible values: ObjectStoreAccess

parameters.name: uploadPartCount
parameters.description: Optional number of parts for the presigned url for uploads (1 - 10000)

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

get.description: Given a volumeId or volume name, get a list of files accessible by the JWT. The default sort returned is alphabetical, ascending. The default page size is 10 items

parameters.name: volume.id
parameters.description: Optional field that specifies comma-separated volume IDs to include in the list

parameters.name: volume.name
parameters.description: Optional field that specifies comma-separated volume names to include in the list

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Optional field that specifies comma-separated paths to include in the list. Value can use wildcards (e.g. /a/b/c/*) or exact matches (e.g. /a/b/c/d/).

parameters.name: isUploaded
parameters.description: Optional field to filter by Uploaded files

parameters.name: archiveStatus
parameters.description: Optional field that specifies comma-separated Archive Statuses to include in the list

parameters.name: recursive
parameters.description: Optional field to specify if files should be returned recursively in and under the specified paths, or only directly in the specified paths

parameters.name: presignedUrlMode
parameters.description:
Optional parameter to specify presigned url's content-disposition. If not specified, the browser will determine the default behavior.
Possible values: Attachment, Inline, Browser

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
Optionally include additional fields in the response. Multiple fields can be included by comma-separation.
Possible values: TotalItemCount, PresignedUrl, InheritedAcl

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: START_DESC END_DESC

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: START_DESC END_DESC

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Optional parameter to see shared data in another tenant

parameters.name: metadata.include
parameters.description: Optional parameter to specify comma separated patterns to include metadata by their field names.

parameters.name: metadata.exclude
parameters.description: Optional parameter to specify comma separated patterns to exclude metadata by their field names.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

post.summary: Create a file entry in GDS and get temporary credentials for upload
post.description: Create a file entry in GDS. Returns temporary credentials and presigned url(s) for file upload directly to S3 when the include=objectStoreAccess parameter is used. Volume ID or volume name is required for file creation. If a folder path is provided and does not exist, GDS creates the folder path in the appropriate account automatically.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
Optionally include additional fields in the response.
            Possible values: ObjectStoreAccess

parameters.name: uploadPartCount
parameters.description: Optional number of parts for the presigned url for uploads (1 - 10000)

409.description: A conflict was found. Make sure the new File doesn't already exist.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

ArchiveStatuses.description: The valid Archive Status values for files in GDS

keyPrefix.description:
Key prefix within the bucket for GDS to operate within. Volumes may only be created within this prefix and the given credentials need only authorize
access here. If not set, default is to allow operation on the full bucket. No leading slash, and must end with a trailing slash.

serverSideEncryptionAlgorithm.description:
Used to specify the type of server-side encryption (SSE) to be used on the object provider.
This value is used to determine the Amazon S3 header "x-amz-server-side-encryption" value.
For example, specify "AES256" for SSE-S3, or "AWS:KMS" for SSE-KMS.
By default if none is specified, "AES256" will be used.

serverSideEncryptionKey.description:
Used to specify the serve-side encryption key that might be associated with the specified server-side encryption algorithm
This value can be the AWS KMS arn key, to be used for the Amazon S3 header "x-amz-server-side-encryption-aws-kms-key-id" value
Value will be ignored if encryption is "AES256"

singlePartUrl.description: A single part presigned url for upload

multipartTemplate.description: A url template for multi parts presigned url for upload

multipartSignatures.description: Multi parts info that needs to be applied to the MultipartTemplate

serverSideEncryptionAlgorithm.description:
The server side encryption method used by S3.
This value is used to determine the Amazon S3 header "x-amz-server-side-encryption" value.
Possible values: 'AES256' and 'aws:kms'.

serverSideEncryptionKey.description:
Server-side encryption key that might be associated with the specified server-side encryption algorithm
This value can be the AWS KMS arn key, to be used for the Amazon S3 header "x-amz-server-side-encryption-aws-kms-key-id" value
This is only used when ServerSideEncryptionAlgorithm is 'aws:kms'

access_Key_Id.description: Access key for use with AWS S3

secret_Access_Key.description: Secret key for use with AWS S3

session_Token.description: Token for use with AWS S3

region.description: AWS region the folder will/does reside in

bucketName.description: AWS bucket the folder will/does reside in

keyPrefix.description: AWS upload location for this folder

serviceUrl.description:
Service endpoint for accessing S3.
This is optional for AWS S3, but mandatory for other services like Taiwan Computing Cloud.

serverSideEncryptionAlgorithm.description:
Used to specify the type of server-side encryption (SSE) to be used on the object provider.
This value is used to determine the Amazon S3 header "x-amz-server-side-encryption" value.
For example, specify "AES256" for SSE-S3, or "AWS:KMS" for SSE-KMS.
By default if none is specified, "AES256" will be used.

serverSideEncryptionKey.description:
Used to specify the serve-side encryption key that might be associated with the specified server-side encryption algorithm
This value can be the AWS KMS arn key, to be used for the Amazon S3 header "x-amz-server-side-encryption-aws-kms-key-id" value
Value will be ignored if encryption is "AES256"

metadata.description: Metadata about this file and its contents

itemsFailed.description: Items failed to be updated with error details

itemsFailedCount.description: Total items failed to be updated

metadata.description: Metadata about this folder and its contents

itemsFailed.description: Items failed to be updated with error details

itemsFailedCount.description: Total items failed to be updated

id.description: Id of resource that failed to be updated

expectedSessionFileCount.description: User-defined count used for reconciling files uploaded when closing the session

name.description: Name of the file to be uploaded, case sensitive.

volumeId.description: Volume ID to which the file will be uploaded

folderPath.description: Optional folder path where the file will be uploaded to

type.description: Optional file content type, e.g. text/plain, application/json

metadata.description: Metadata about this file and its contents

name.description: Folder name, unique to this path, for the folder being created

folderPath.description: Path from the root folder to the location for the folder being created; must start and end with '/'

volumeId.description: The unique identifier for this Folder's Volume

volumeName.description: The unique name for the Folder's Volume

metadata.description: Metadata about this folder and its contents

acl.description: Optional array to replace the acl on the resource.

metadata.description: Metadata about this session and its contents

id.description: A unique identifier for this Session

folderUrn.description: The Universal Resource Name of the Folder associated with the Session

timeCreated.description: The date & time this Session was created, in GDS

timeCredentialsExpire.description: The date & time this upload session expires

timeClosed.description: The date & time this Session was closed, in GDS

timeCompleted.description: The date & time this Session was completed, in GDS

volumeConfigurationName.description: Unique name of the volume configuration to use

rootKeyPrefix.description:
The base bucket location for volumes associated with custom VolumeConfigurations. If not provided, the given volume Name is used.
If provided, it must start with the VolumeConfiguration's keyprefix and end with a /.
To create a volume representing the root of a bucket, use the value '/'.

metadata.description: Metadata about this volume and its contents

id.description: A unique identifier for this Volume

tenantId.description: The unique identifier for this Volume's Tenant

subTenantId.description: The unique identifier for this Volume's Sub Tenant

urn.description: The Universal Resource Name, unique to this Volume

rootFolderId.description: The unique identifier for the root Folder of this Volume

rootKeyPrefix.description: The base bucket location for Volumes associated with custom VolumeConfigurations otherwise this field is not set.

volumeConfigurationName.description:
Unique name of the Volume configuration for this Volume.
This field will only be set if a custom Volume configuration is associated.

inheritedAcl.description: The inherited list of Id(s) that have access to this Volume

timeCreated.description: The date & time this Volume was created, in GDS

timeModified.description: The date & time this Volume was updated, in GDS

importSessionId.description:
Unique identifier of the import Session for this Volume. This only applies to Volumes created from custom
Volume configurations.

code.description: Error code that uniquely identifies the type of error that occurred

message.description: Description of the error that occurred

details.description: Additional details for conditions that caused the error

JobStatus.description:
This enum was originally created to store the type of job on a folder or file entity. 
The Job entity is now used to track this information for copy operations, with the Illumina.Gds.Api.Models.Enums.JobOperationType 
and Illumina.Gds.Api.Models.Enums.JobProgressStatus used to record the type and progress status of the job.

metadata.description: Metadata about this file and its contents
Metadata about this volume and its contents

itemCount.description: Number of items included in the page

nextPageToken.description: PageToken for the next paged list

prevPageToken.description: PageToken for the previous paged list

lastPageToken.description: PageToken for the last paged list. Only included when totalItemCount is listed

totalItemCount.description: Total number of items in all pages. Only included when requested

totalPageCount.description: Total number of pages. Only included when totalItemCount is listed

VolumeConfigurationOnlineStatus.description: The valid Online Status values for Volume configurations in GDS

tenantId.description: The unique identifier for this Volume Configuration's Tenant

subTenantId.description: The unique identifier for this Volume Configurations's Sub Tenant

urn.description: The Universal Resource Name, unique to this Volume Configuration

errorCode.description: Error code returned from the object store

errorMessage.description: Error message returned from the object store

timeOfLastError.description: Timestamp of the last observed error.

timeCreated.description: The date & time this Volume was created, in GDS

timeModified.description: The date & time this Volume was updated, in GDS

includePresignedUrl.description: Optional parameter that returns presigned URL for each file when set to true

presignedUrlMode.description:
Optional parameter to specify presigned url's content-disposition. If not specified, the browser will determine the default behavior.
Possible values: Attachment, Inline, Browser

VolumeFileListRequest.description: Request for listing files within a volume

gracePeriodDays.description: Number of days before the files associated to this volume expires

itemCount.description: Number of items included in the page

nextPageToken.description: PageToken for the next paged list

prevPageToken.description: PageToken for the previous paged list

lastPageToken.description: PageToken for the last paged list. Only included when totalItemCount is listed

totalItemCount.description: Total number of items in all pages. Only included when requested

totalPageCount.description: Total number of pages. Only included when totalItemCount is listed

id.description: A unique identifier for this Volume

tenantId.description: The unique identifier for this Volume's Tenant

subTenantId.description: The unique identifier for this Volume's Sub Tenant

urn.description: The Universal Resource Name, unique to this Volume

rootFolderId.description: The unique identifier for the root Folder of this Volume

rootKeyPrefix.description: The base bucket location for Volumes associated with custom VolumeConfigurations otherwise this field is not set.

volumeConfigurationName.description:
Unique name of the Volume configuration for this Volume.
This field will only be set if a custom Volume configuration is associated.

inheritedAcl.description: The inherited list of Id(s) that have access to this Volume

timeCreated.description: The date & time this Volume was created, in GDS

timeModified.description: The date & time this Volume was updated, in GDS

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
Bearer.name: Authorization
